name: T3D2 - Blitz3d World Editor 2
description:
This is version 2 of the T3d Blitz3d world editor. With more functionality and adds  Physics elements to be used with the Newton Physics Wrapper.

 T3D2 is used to edit game worlds and levels for the Blitz3d Game engine. It also creates .bb files at compile, creating a separate .bb file for each object.

To use physics elements in the editor, you need to download the 'Newton Physics wrapper' for Blitz3d.
